title: Becca
description: Becca Keith was never a one-man woman until she met Brad, but he's made monogamy fun, and she's head over heels for him. Her thirtieth birthday is in a few days, and Brad has promised her a rather unique giftâ€”his best friend, cocky and irresistible Colin. When Brad comes to her with a confession and a suggestion, Becca gets a choice. She can stay with Brad, leave him, or give in to something that might make her happy beyond her wildest dreams. Note: The story includes pretty boys being stubborn and confused, and a big beautiful woman, who loves sexy-times with more than one partners.
author: Sotia Lazu
